channel.title: Questing
channel.description:
I'm going to start questing for Desert Treasure, Lunar Diplomacy, and Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf.
I'm going to start today hopefully.
I'll give you a list.
Key: Green = Finished Orange = Started Red = Not started
[b][s]Desert Treasure[/s] Pre-questies: [/b] [s][color=green]• The Digsite (ugh) • The Tourist Trap • Temple of Ikov • Priest in Peril • Waterfall Quest • Troll Stronghold[/s] [s]• Death Plaque[/s]
[b][s]Lunar Diplomacy[/s] Pre-questies:[/b]
[s]• Fremennik Trials • Lost City[/s] [s]• Shilo Village[/s] [s]• Jungle Potion[/s] [s]• Rune Mysteries[/s]
[b]Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf[/b]
• Forgettable Tale of a Chaos Dwarf • the Giant Dwarf • Between a Rock [s]• Dwarf Cannon[/s] [s]• Fishing Contest
If anyone wants to join me, I'll add you to the list.

[/quote]Nice

I did a few noob quests, 239 qp’s now

Lets do Forgiveness of a Chaos Dwarf together…? You can use hand cannon after[/quote]Sweet, maybe I’m busy with school at the moment (I’ll be finished on Tuesday afternoon ~3pm PST)

I did Defender of Varrock yesterday though
